SENT.plain: Anterior sacral meningocele is a not rare entity
Treatment is usually surgical and consists in a transacral posterior approach with patching of the communication between the malformation and the dural sac
But surgery can be difficult and require multiple procedures
We report the first case of a giant anterior sacral meeningocele rapidly cured by a simple endoscopic procedure
We believe that more attention should be used in the diagnosis of such cases as they can be so easily cured
We have reviewed the literature about anterior sacral meningocele and particularly its treatment and its association either with Marfan syndrome or a familial occurrence
